channel.title: Creating wallet within the BitBAY Web-based Marketplace (WMP)
channel.description:
# **Creating a new WMP wallet**
**1. Go to https://beta.bitbay.market/wallet/create** \ \ **2. Read the terms of use (pop-up window), and click “Understood”.**
**![|365x237](/uploads/default/original/1X/b1dde21845c32d4c43504dcb91994d0a1b9acd9f.png)** \ \ **3. Then, click “Generate Unique Passphrase”.**
**![|528x204](/uploads/default/original/1X/1cfb264003e3901f6aa30d09c0bab3fa9d197818.png)** \ \ **4. Write down each of the 12 keywords that appear [(mnemonic seed phrase)](https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Seed_phrase), in exact order, and each line from left to right. Alternatively, you can simply click within the box to copy them, and manually paste into a text file or document.**
**![|451x148](/uploads/default/original/1X/1a89e46fccba3d38b0186f9a1b3b04408e07382f.png)**
_***Note: Keep this seed phrase in a safe place! If you lose access to it, recovering your funds and listings will be impossible._ \ \ **5. Next, you will be asked to confirm your backing up of this phrase. Click the words in the order they were written down, and then click “Confirm”**
**![|467x228](/uploads/default/original/1X/2447af6448f79cd01322213d50e28e1104921929.png)**
**![|344x267](/uploads/default/original/1X/9b1254af4e8666a5caad37981d18a27efbcd9649.png)** \ \ **6. Then click “Set up easy access” to create a simple username and password for the account. This will allow you to login easily, without having to complete a full “wallet restore” using the 12 word seed phrase.**
**![|466x205](/uploads/default/original/1X/932250bc1c6a80472f69e8ccfa750aa390323301.png)** \ \ **7. Then, enter a custom username of your choice, and click “Continue”.**
**![|583x148](/uploads/default/original/1X/3f7570677d6e430a2d40f632151b7332bbd5d2d1.png)** \ \ **8. Next, enter and confirm a new password that meets the minimum requirements, then click “Save Password”.**
**![|507x227](/uploads/default/original/1X/4950674212f8f333a7a5d256ee6956851ee36f6b.jpeg)** \ \ **9. Finally, read the quick review of the BitBay terms of use. Then click “Understood”.**
**![|361x178](/uploads/default/original/1X/e750b45d1ac3c65d5396f9a3b8d1da5dbe27ed53.png)**

item.title: Creating wallet within the BitBAY Web-based Marketplace (WMP)
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.source: Creating wallet within the BitBAY Web-based Marketplace (WMP)

item.title: Creating wallet within the BitBAY Web-based Marketplace (WMP)
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Creating a new WMP wallet

1. Go to https://beta.bitbay.market/wallet/create


2. Read the terms of use (pop-up window), and click “Understood”.

InKAL6lGifpfM0TTbWf4T-wQtd59qjCDr0Q3fwGn6FLBrIcsfC6YIyWvy-qirfutef2yjfy0-n9hfk1I3p3dPpVCVHxQix0VukBLPvSRl_lDuRTVspya2KAIpZv3nDpXhG78KAZH.png1112x716 80.5 KB



3. Then, click “Generate Unique Passphrase”.

vf2afD3tUxTQ27LefO2cLoqpdsaoqVloxT9UNAYbaNagoU07WwLrWMFtMsyCyUjDtLmNQ4QBkjr7Iyf5P3nJzZohGD9yx7eY-ptYsUUXUADqN_s7lNu5Owe077fMy-i198BNQnL3.png1600x571 109 KB



4. Write down each of the 12 keywords that appear (mnemonic seed phrase), in exact order, and each line from left to right. Alternatively, you can simply click within the box to copy them, and manually paste into a text file or document.

GIq1qmBgLeq_hnKcahUreHfZuY1OFeX-gT0WmIZv2zY0MkeYMSKNakA_5CXEq7t-a8-i7RJogmUppVSQixYzUpEMa_1yKB9f-9kJAN6Q73zpaq6NAIHghoPtV90YatVUOpL58YQW.png1600x541 139 KB

***Note: Keep this seed phrase in a safe place! If you lose access to it, recovering your funds and listings will be impossible.


5. Next, you will be asked to confirm your backing up of this phrase. Click the words in the order they were written down, and then click “Confirm”

iW380e3HRdhCqxBw_gPc_Ehb9KaSB9j89agdP3v9wrskp2d_6XShCUQB3HkP47XCq-yAnJbJXPM9_2KiXK6ksAq9dvAcHycz_G8p-6tXCK315qWSKC2S3PiFfvgN-RI-o7OAzXW9.png1600x779 106 KB

OmBZNnzUhTrTZodjesST-F8xTPwBqlh2eUIOqhtmuWhH7Kn5xmuXhP0ZPVym3Bi_6dNmUOHzwIJzgT-aFCnrkvt8crFtGf6k71-gNJY9Zz4X_CBv7iPFkO-hnoQ7OZ7yrKrTKuPo.png828x644 22 KB



6. Then click “Set up easy access” to create a simple username and password for the account. This will allow you to login easily, without having to complete a full “wallet restore” using the 12 word seed phrase.

z0rwLIh5pnMAPp4T0LKRl3pM1GWX6qESyMf4lji3feAdV0GtDurN4lONDsiOBBxkNZfY4hALxDB_ZM6YQ-f0ckRymJTelrtUvjF0QaSoe0n_6zIQXKWLh6jFIVAm4v9X69RdJHMB.png1600x704 184 KB



7. Then, enter a custom username of your choice, and click “Continue”.

yPy2b0Jsn5uwKYGqDJi5YRNERr30us86b7U9kBrxefFwzHLVCg5p9Wg6TL-B2PbFmMUHLvpWPaKC_p6B4LSyeFp6nWOSS5qtvFRff9DAurz-YSlgf0X1jYPL8D7c6_GZGR9r0I65.png1600x408 111 KB



8. Next, enter and confirm a new password that meets the minimum requirements, then click “Save Password”.

AAK4ht1NUcpuRabkAc6s6I1ylXCPlzDT3CEWpV_3bAPgC__UzT3O894GzUjH8tt8MTeIGrWxQ9nrGoMMgpms5eUdZIIwFlgBTW6TZ02Qe4zU2-RaiYDfzvj7KFjnv9hNXVLFUdes.jpg1600x717 129 KB



9. Finally, read the quick review of the BitBay terms of use. Then click “Understood”.

DSc_T-cLK68Dz_7rCITLlhsVP_fJRAq94UeI9tP97eBdIpA9XLFAbey6lreiYujfwK5Ec1r8rqz_w6BIyPtA4FjweKf0GAOysAmXmGMDLKzE6lnfti_bqI6onjcXVx_KQ0zIGgVL.png1128x560 56.7 KB

Read full topic
item.source: Creating wallet within the BitBAY Web-based Marketplace (WMP)
